overview: Alpha's been raised along scientific principles, and will make Mike Regan a great human interest story for his paper. But when his interview prompts Alpha to run away from the institute and ask him to show her some magic, Mike gets more responsibility than he bargained for. Especially since another story of his, one involving gangsters, has also come home to roost.
tagline: NTRODUCING THE M.G.M. NEW STAR..MISS MARGARET O'BRIEN
title: Lost Angel
